goal: To analyze relationships between different attributes in the dataset using Pearson correlation.
persona: A data analyst with expertise in statistical analysis and data manipulation, focused on exploring correlations within datasets to uncover meaningful relationships between variables and enhance decision-making. Has 4 years of experience in conducting large-scale data analyses for customer behavior studies, specifically within the retail sector. Keen interest in leveraging data to optimize marketing strategies and improve customer segmentation through quantitative insights.
